name: MonsterCake - Complete! :D
description:
IT HAS SO MUSCH BUTTONS!!! :D

Game in devloppement as a school project!

Have fun walking on walls and blowing up stuff!

Main feature : Alot of buttons! WOW!!!!!

Oh...there is also a game i guess lol. BUT DID YOU TRIED ALL THE BUTTONS?!?!?!?

I strongly recomment using the missile on the hearts! It blows everything up!

I also strongly recommend to spam massively the "Lag" Button until your computer explode.

I provided a couple of lolis in the game and stuff. The roulette is fake. You don't deserve to spin the loliroulette. She deserves better than this.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PC Controls : 

Alt Key - Shoot a projectile that transport the player to the hit location!

Left mouse click - Shoot laser

Right Mouse click(hold) - lock a missile on the ennemy(heart)

WASD or Arrow keys - Moving?

Spacebar - Fly(like a jetpack!)

P Key - Restart the game for more explosions!

Escape Key - Quit the game :p

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Have fun! 

(P.S) Screw the memes button. There are enough memes as it is now.
